Updated Desktop PC Prices in Bangladesh – 2025

At FelnaTech, we offer desktop PCs for every need and budget. Entry-level budget desktops start from ৳20,000 and are ideal for basic tasks like browsing, studying, or home use. Prices may vary depending on brand, configuration, and market availability. We constantly update our listings to reflect real-time pricing and bring you the best possible deals. With FelnaTech, you always get transparent pricing, no hidden charges, and trusted service.

Key Features to Consider Before You Buy

When choosing a desktop PC, it’s crucial to consider several key features to ensure the system meets your needs. The processor (CPU) is the core of your desktop, with Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3 being suitable for basic tasks like browsing and office work, while more powerful CPUs like Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 are ideal for demanding work like gaming, video editing, or 3D rendering. The amount of RAM directly impacts your system’s multitasking capabilities; 8GB is enough for light use, but for tasks like gaming, media creation, or running multiple applications at once, 16GB or more is recommended for smooth performance. Storage options include HDDs for larger capacity at a more affordable price, but SSDs are the clear winner for faster boot times and quicker application load speeds. A hybrid setup—using an SSD for your operating system and important programs, along with a larger HDD for your files and backups—offers a great balance of speed and capacity. The graphics card (GPU) plays a crucial role for gamers, designers, and content creators; integrated graphics may suffice for basic tasks, but dedicated GPUs like the NVIDIA RTX 4060 or AMD RX 7600 are needed for high-end graphics performance. A quality power supply (PSU) is essential for system stability and long-term durability, with 80+ Bronze or Gold certifications ensuring efficient power delivery to your components. For cooling, a good airflow system is necessary to prevent overheating; basic air cooling is fine for low to mid-range systems, but high-performance PCs will benefit from advanced cooling solutions like liquid cooling or upgraded air coolers. Finally, ensure your monitor is compatible with your GPU, with Full HD (1920x1080) being standard for everyday use, but gamers and video editors should opt for 2K or 4K monitors that support higher refresh rates for a more immersive and responsive experience. By carefully considering these factors, you’ll be able to choose the right desktop PC that perfectly suits your specific requirements, ensuring top-notch performance and efficiency.

Key Features to Consider Before Buying a Desktop PC

Choosing the right desktop PC can be a game-changer for productivity or entertainment. Before buying, consider these key specs and factors:

 

🔧 Processor (CPU)

The processor is the central processing unit (CPU) of your PC. For everyday tasks, Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3 can handle it. For creative work, a Core i7/Ryzen 7 or higher processor is recommended. Intel is known for strong single-threaded performance, while AMD excels in multi-threaded operations like editing and rendering.

 

💾 RAM

RAM (Random Access Memory) determines how many tasks your PC can handle simultaneously. We recommend 8GB RAM for basic use and 16GB+ for gaming or heavy workloads. DDR4 is currently standard, but DDR5 is emerging with faster speeds.

 

💽 Storage

Choose between traditional HDDs (more storage, slower speed) and SSDs (faster speed, better reliability). For best performance, go for a system with an SSD boot drive and additional HDD for storage.

 

🎮 Graphics Card (GPU)

Gaming, video editing, and 3D rendering require powerful GPU. Integrated graphics are fine for casual use, but gamers should aim for a dedicated GPU like RTX 4060, 4070, or RX 7600.

 

🔌 Power Supply (PSU)

A good quality PSU ensures safe and stable power delivery to your components. Look for 80+ Bronze or Gold-certified power supplies for long-term reliability.

 

🧊 Cooling System

Efficient airflow and cooling help maintain system health. High-performance rigs benefit from liquid or upgraded air cooling systems.

 

📺 Monitor Compatibility

Are you planning to buy a monitor, too? Pair your desktop with a Full HD (1920x1080) or 4K UHD display, with refresh rates based on your needs—60Hz for general use, 144Hz or more for gaming.

Explore the Full Range of Desktop PC

🖥️ Brand Desktop PC

Brand PCs, also known as pre-built desktop computers, are ideal for users who prefer convenience, reliability, and extended warranties. Desktop PC Price in Bangladesh – 2025 Update

Mini PC                                                                                          ৳18,000 – ৳80,000

Key Features to Consider Before Buying a Desktop PC

Choosing the right desktop PC can be a game-changer for productivity or entertainment. Before buying, consider these key specs and factors:

 

🔧 Processor (CPU)

The processor is the central processing unit (CPU) of your PC. For everyday tasks, Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3 can handle it. For creative work, a Core i7/Ryzen 7 or higher processor is recommended. Intel is known for strong single-threaded performance, while AMD excels in multi-threaded operations like editing and rendering.

 

💾 RAM

RAM (Random Access Memory) determines how many tasks your PC can handle simultaneously. We recommend 8GB RAM for basic use and 16GB+ for gaming or heavy workloads. DDR4 is currently standard, but DDR5 is emerging with faster speeds.

 

💽 Storage

Choose between traditional HDDs (more storage, slower speed) and SSDs (faster speed, better reliability). For best performance, go for a system with an SSD boot drive and additional HDD for storage.

 

🎮 Graphics Card (GPU)

Gaming, video editing, and 3D rendering require powerful GPU. Integrated graphics are fine for casual use, but gamers should aim for a dedicated GPU like RTX 4060, 4070, or RX 7600.

 

🔌 Power Supply (PSU)

A good quality PSU ensures safe and stable power delivery to your components. Look for 80+ Bronze or Gold-certified power supplies for long-term reliability.

 

🧊 Cooling System

Efficient airflow and cooling help maintain system health. High-performance rigs benefit from liquid or upgraded air cooling systems.

 

📺 Monitor Compatibility

Are you planning to buy a monitor, too? Pair your desktop with a Full HD (1920x1080) or 4K UHD display, with refresh rates based on your needs—60Hz for general use, 144Hz or more for gaming.

Explore Our Wide Range of Security Solutions at FelnaTech

At FelnaTech, we understand the importance of safety and security for your home, business, and other properties. That’s why we offer a comprehensive selection of high-quality security products, including CCTV cameras, access control systems, smart door locks, and more, from trusted global brands like Dahua, Hikvision, Uniview, and ZKTeco. Whether you're looking for a basic setup or an advanced security solution, we’ve got you covered with top-notch technology, reliability, and support.

CCTV Cameras – The Eyes You Need for Your Safety

CCTV cameras are your first line of defense when it comes to protecting your property. At FelnaTech, we offer a variety of CCTV camera options tailored to meet your specific needs. Whether you require HD, IP, or PTZ cameras, each model is equipped with advanced features like high-definition resolution, night vision, and weatherproof designs to ensure reliable surveillance in any environment.

CCTV HD Cameras – Clear, Cost-Effective Surveillance

The CCTV HD Camera is an ideal choice for those looking for affordable and straightforward surveillance. These cameras provide reliable video footage in high-definition resolution, ensuring you can clearly monitor activities around your property. They are perfect for basic surveillance needs, such as monitoring entrances, parking spaces, or other areas that require less intensive coverage. Despite being budget-friendly, these HD cameras still offer solid performance, making them a great option for homeowners, small businesses, or anyone looking to add an extra layer of security without going over budget.

CCTV IP Cameras – Advanced Connectivity for Remote Surveillance

CCTV IP Cameras are ideal for users who require remote access and real-time monitoring, offering an advanced level of convenience and security. With built-in internet connectivity, you can easily access live footage from anywhere — whether you're at home, in the office, or traveling abroad — using your smartphone, tablet, or computer. These cameras deliver exceptional image quality, ensuring clear and detailed video streams. Additionally, they are highly scalable, allowing easy integration into broader security systems, making them perfect for expanding your surveillance coverage as your needs grow. Whether you're a tech-savvy homeowner or a business owner looking to monitor multiple locations, IP cameras offer flexibility, seamless connectivity, and peace of mind, knowing that you can keep an eye on your property at all times, no matter where you are.

CCTV PTZ Cameras – Comprehensive Coverage with Full Control

CCTV PTZ Cameras are ideal for dynamic surveillance across large areas. With pan, tilt, and zoom capabilities, you can remotely control the camera’s view and focus on specific zones as needed. This makes them perfect for monitoring parking lots, open spaces, or expansive properties. PTZ cameras offer flexible coverage and greater control, ensuring no blind spots remain in your surveillance system.

CCTV Recorders – Store and Access Footage Safely

When it comes to storing your footage, you need a reliable DVR or NVR system. At FelnaTech, we offer both CCTV DVR and CCTV NVR systems to store your surveillance data securely, allowing for easy playback and quick access whenever you need it.

CCTV DVR – For Analog Camera Systems
CCTV DVRs are perfect for traditional analog camera setups, offering stable and affordable video recording. At FelnaTech, our DVRs support multiple channels and provide clear playback with features like motion detection and HDMI output. They’re easy to use and ideal for homes, offices, or shops needing reliable footage storage without breaking the bank.

CCTV NVR – For Modern IP Surveillance
Designed for IP camera systems, CCTV NVRs use your network to record high-resolution video. FelnaTech offers NVRs with remote access, smart alerts, and cloud storage options, making surveillance smarter and more flexible. Whether it’s for a home or business, our NVRs ensure smooth performance and easy control from anywhere.

Access Control – Keep Your Space Secure and Managed

Whether you're securing a home, office, or commercial facility, our Access Control solutions provide the perfect balance of convenience, security, and control. These systems are designed to manage and monitor entry points effectively, giving you full authority over who can access specific areas. With advanced features such as keyless entry, biometric fingerprint recognition, RFID cards, facial detection, and real-time activity logs, you can ensure that only authorized personnel gain access to restricted zones. Ideal for businesses, educational institutions, and residential buildings, FelnaTech’s access control systems enhance safety while simplifying access management.

Smart door lock systems are a modern and secure way to control access to your home or office. At FelnaTech, we offer a range of smart locks that replace traditional keys with advanced features like fingerprint recognition, RFID card access, PIN codes, and mobile app connectivity. These locks allow you to lock or unlock your door remotely, receive real-time access alerts, and track entry logs, giving you complete control and peace of mind. Perfect for families, businesses, or rental properties, smart door locks combine convenience with high-level security. With sleek designs and powerful functionality, models from top brands like ZKTeco, SmartLife, and NITGEN offer a seamless upgrade to any entry point. Whether you're upgrading for convenience, security, or both, smart door locks are a future-ready choice that brings modern innovation to everyday living.

Explore the Full Range of Desktop PC

🖥️ Brand Desktop PC

Brand PCs, also known as pre-built desktop computers, are ideal for users who prefer convenience, reliability, and extended warranties. These systems come fully assembled by manufacturers and offer excellent performance for office, home, and educational use. Whether it’s for handling daily tasks, running enterprise software, or managing cloud-based workflows, brand desktops provide efficient performance and excellent after-sales service.

For users who want more control over their setup, custom desktop PCs are the way to go. Whether you’re a gamer, content creator, or IT professional, customizing your PC allows you to choose every component—CPU, GPU, RAM, motherboard, cooling system, and more. Looking for reliable systems for your business? Our business desktop PCs are engineered to support multi-tasking, data processing, document management, and virtual meetings with ease. We stock systems with energy-efficient designs, long life cycles, and trusted security features perfect for office environments.

 

🏠 Home & All-in-One PC

If you're setting up a family computer or want a minimal workspace, consider our All-in-One (AIO) and home PCs. AIO desktops combine the monitor and CPU into a single, compact device, saving space while delivering excellent performance. Perfect for web browsing, streaming, schoolwork, and even light editing.

 

📦 Mini PC

Want a small form factor PC? Our mini PCs are ideal for tight spaces and portability. These desktops pack surprising performance into tiny builds and are perfect for point-of-sale systems, kiosks, and home setups with limited room.

 

Desktop PC Price in Bangladesh – 2025 Update

We keep our desktop PC price list updated so you always know what to expect when shopping. Here's an overview of what you can find at FelnaTech:

Key Features to Consider Before Buying a Desktop PC

Choosing the right desktop PC can be a game-changer for productivity or entertainment. Before buying, consider these key specs and factors:

 

🔧 Processor (CPU)

The processor is the central processing unit (CPU) of your PC. For everyday tasks, Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3 can handle it. For creative work, a Core i7/Ryzen 7 or higher processor is recommended. Intel is known for strong single-threaded performance, while AMD excels in multi-threaded operations like editing and rendering.

 

💾 RAM

RAM (Random Access Memory) determines how many tasks your PC can handle simultaneously. We recommend 8GB RAM for basic use and 16GB+ for gaming or heavy workloads. DDR4 is currently standard, but DDR5 is emerging with faster speeds.

 

💽 Storage

Choose between traditional HDDs (more storage, slower speed) and SSDs (faster speed, better reliability). For best performance, go for a system with an SSD boot drive and additional HDD for storage.

 

🎮 Graphics Card (GPU)

Gaming, video editing, and 3D rendering require powerful GPU. Integrated graphics are fine for casual use, but gamers should aim for a dedicated GPU like RTX 4060, 4070, or RX 7600.

 

🔌 Power Supply (PSU)

A good quality PSU ensures safe and stable power delivery to your components. Look for 80+ Bronze or Gold-certified power supplies for long-term reliability.

 

🧊 Cooling System

Efficient airflow and cooling help maintain system health. High-performance rigs benefit from liquid or upgraded air cooling systems.

 

📺 Monitor Compatibility

Are you planning to buy a monitor, too? Pair your desktop with a Full HD (1920x1080) or 4K UHD display, with refresh rates based on your needs—60Hz for general use, 144Hz or more for gaming.

Explore the Full Range of Desktop PC

At FelnaTech, we understand that every user has unique requirements, which is why we offer a wide range of desktop categories tailored to different needs:

 

🖥️ Brand Desktop PC

Brand PCs, also known as pre-built desktop computers, are ideal for users who prefer convenience, reliability, and extended warranties. These systems come fully assembled by manufacturers and offer excellent performance for office, home, and educational use. Whether it’s for handling daily tasks, running enterprise software, or managing cloud-based workflows, brand desktops provide efficient performance and excellent after-sales service.

 

🧩 Custom Desktop PC

Whether you’re a gamer, content creator, or IT professional, customizing your PC allows you to choose every component—CPU, GPU, RAM, motherboard, cooling system, and more. We stock systems with energy-efficient designs, long life cycles, and trusted security features perfect for office environments.

 

🏠 Home & All-in-One PC

If you're setting up a family computer or want a minimal workspace, consider our All-in-One (AIO) and home PCs. AIO desktops combine the monitor and CPU into a single, compact device, saving space while delivering excellent performance. Perfect for web browsing, streaming, schoolwork, and even light editing.

Key Features to Consider Before Buying a Desktop PC

Choosing the right desktop PC can be a game-changer for productivity or entertainment. Before buying, consider these key specs and factors:

 

🔧 Processor (CPU)

The processor is the central processing unit (CPU) of your PC. For everyday tasks, Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3 can handle it. For creative work, a Core i7/Ryzen 7 or higher processor is recommended. Intel is known for strong single-threaded performance, while AMD excels in multi-threaded operations like editing and rendering.

 

💾 RAM

RAM (Random Access Memory) determines how many tasks your PC can handle simultaneously. We recommend 8GB RAM for basic use and 16GB+ for gaming or heavy workloads. DDR4 is currently standard, but DDR5 is emerging with faster speeds.

 

💽 Storage

Choose between traditional HDDs (more storage, slower speed) and SSDs (faster speed, better reliability). For best performance, go for a system with an SSD boot drive and additional HDD for storage.

 

🎮 Graphics Card (GPU)

Gaming, video editing, and 3D rendering require powerful GPU. Integrated graphics are fine for casual use, but gamers should aim for a dedicated GPU like RTX 4060, 4070, or RX 7600.

 

🔌 Power Supply (PSU)

A good quality PSU ensures safe and stable power delivery to your components. Look for 80+ Bronze or Gold-certified power supplies for long-term reliability.

 

🧊 Cooling System

Efficient airflow and cooling help maintain system health. High-performance rigs benefit from liquid or upgraded air cooling systems.

 

📺 Monitor Compatibility

Are you planning to buy a monitor, too? Pair your desktop with a Full HD (1920x1080) or 4K UHD display, with refresh rates based on your needs—60Hz for general use, 144Hz or more for gaming.
